titleStmt.title: A letter sent to Master A.B. from the most godly and learned preacher I.B. in which is set forth the authoritie of parentes vpon their children, for gyuing of correction vnto them.
titleStmt.author: Bradford, John, 1510?-1555.

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: A letter touching correction of children.
The woodcut strips on title page are the same as in STC 19875--STC.
Reproduction of original in the Pembroke College Library, Cambridge University, Cambridge, England.
